name: Project Hermes - Launch Your Messages into Near Space
blurb: Named after the Greek Messenger God Hermes, our mission hopes to deliver your items into near-space (over 30 kilometres high).

name: Pie In Space! (Round 2)
blurb: The second round of funding for the most amazing project ever where a high school freshman is sending pie into SPACE!!!

name: Pie In Space!
blurb: A high school freshman is sending pie into space and you can be a part of it.  GO SCIENCE!!!

name: SAGANet STEM Mentoring Lab Accreditation
blurb: Support the accreditation of our online STEM Mentoring Program with the International Mentoring Association

name: Project Dragonfly - Sail to the Stars
blurb: The first international contest to let students shape the future of interstellar travel.

name: Reboot the Suit: Bring Back Neil Armstrong’s Spacesuit
blurb: A chance for citizens of Earth to conserve, digitize, and display Neil Armstrong's Apollo 11 spacesuit for explorers everywhere.

name: LightSail: A Revolutionary Solar Sailing Spacecraft
blurb: Unlimited free energy from the sun will provide CubeSat propulsion and revolutionize access to space for low-cost citizen projects.

name: KickSat -- Your personal spacecraft in space!
blurb: Would you like to have your own spacecraft?  Kickstart the personal space age by helping launch tiny spacecraft into low Earth orbit.

name: Final Frontier Design's 3G Space Suit
blurb: We are building a flight certified space suit for the burgeoning commercial space industry!

name: Historic Robotic Spacecraft Poster Series
blurb: Three screen-printed posters celebrating the most popular and most notable interplanetary robotic space missions.

name: Historic Robotic Spacecraft Poster Series Two
blurb: Chop Shop’s second series of posters celebrating the most popular and most notable robotic space exploration missions.

name: Antimatter Fuel Production
blurb: We have designed an antimatter thruster capable of reaching the nearest star.  A plan for antimatter fuel production is now needed.

name: Giant Leaps in Space Poster Series
blurb: Giant Leaps featuring the historic missions of human spaceflight is the third in our series of space exploration prints

name: Aqua Dragons in Space! STEM project for kids 6-99 years old
blurb: 3, 2, 1, Blast off! We're looking to send our Aqua Dragons into Space creating the world's first live Astro Pets. Support the mission!

name: Support finding life in the Universe!
blurb: Your donation will advance exolife finding technology. You'll be rewarded with ExoCube, a 3D glass map of potentially habitable worlds.

name: The World's First Enamel Pin Featuring Authentic MOON DUST
blurb: Celebrate Apollo 11 at 50 years with a pin and meteorite pen set featuring real MOON DUST! Super unique gift idea!

name: "Positive Space" Inspirational Space Prints
blurb: Space art / decor for your home or workplace. Featuring Hubble, Voyager, James Webb (+ more!) plus encouraging thoughts and drawings :)

name: MarsVR - Virtual Reality Platform To Support Exploring Mars
blurb: The Mars Society is creating a virtual reality platform for serious research to support the human exploration of Mars.

name: Space Junk: excavating the Tiziou Space History "museum"
blurb: For space geeks everywhere: a son explores & shares his journalist father's incredible collection of aerospace archives & collectibles.

name: Death Star in Space
blurb: Let's launch a 3D printed miniature Death Star into SPACE with fully functional LASER's to celebrate Star Wars: Episode IX

name: The Quarterdeck's Whistle By Oceanus Brass
blurb: Nautically inspired and built to last.

name: LUNARK - Building and Testing a Moon Home for Everyone
blurb: Help us on our extreme mission to make life in space livable.

name: The Mars Atlas
blurb: Explore the Red Planet with maps crafted by NASA-trained cartographers and visit our neighbor through Mars Portal.

name: James Webb and Space • One-inch buttons
blurb: Celebrate the launch of the James Webb telescope with a fun collection of one-inch buttons. Free shipping worldwide.

name: The Solar System Flipbook Collection
blurb: A journey through space featuring animation, activity cards, AR and a genuine meteorite.

name: The Space Telescopes Poster Series
blurb: A new Chop Shop screen printed poster series featuring the space telescopes Webb, the Planet Finders, and Hubble.

name: Meco Rocket Simulator - Build Your Own Rocket Engine
blurb: Design Engine Cooling, Injectors, Nozzles, Turbopumps, and More. Accuracy Tested Against Data from Real-Life Rocket Engines.
